sentences.en: A venomous tropical American pit viper ( Bothrops atrox ) having brown and grayish markings.
sentences.cn: 矛头蛇一种产于美洲身上有褐灰色斑点的热带毒蛇 ( 矛头蝮矛头蝮属 )

sentences.en: And he wields the tooth of a venomous snake.
sentences.cn: 接着他又挥挥手中的毒蛇牙.

sentences.en: Because humans live on land, they don't think of fish venomous.
sentences.cn: 因为人类居住在陆地上, 他们很难想到鱼含有剧毒.

sentences.en: Consider through relapsing venomous scheme of a bloodcurdling held his mind.
sentences.cn: 经过反复考虑,一条恐怖的毒计占据了他的脑海.

sentences.en: Everyone can be very venomous, if you taste what is the jealousness.
sentences.cn: 任何人都可以变得狠毒, 只要你尝试过什么叫忌妒.

sentences.en: He had been bitten by a venomous snake.
He survived an attack by one of the most venomous snakes in the Americas.
sentences.cn: 在美洲,他在剧毒毒蛇的攻击下幸运地生还.

sentences.en: He was surprised by the venomous tone of the anonymous calls.
sentences.cn: 那些匿名电话的恶毒语气很令他吃惊。

sentences.en: His eldest brother died after the venomous bite from the rattlesnake.
sentences.cn: 遭到毒蛇咬后,他大哥死了.

sentences.en: Injuries by jellyfish stings , venomous fish , sponges , and coral are not uncommon.
sentences.cn: 然而被海胆刺所伤则是相当少见的, 而且治疗通常也相当困难.

sentences.en: It preys mostly on other snakes, even venomous ones.
sentences.cn: 它主要捕食其它蛇类, 甚至毒蛇.

sentences.en: Lisa shot him a venomous glance.
sentences.cn: 莉萨恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

sentences.en: Reid reserved his most venomous attack for the Rail Authority.
sentences.cn: 里德攻击铁路当局还有最厉害的一招没使出来。

sentences.en: She painted the house a venomous yellow.
sentences.cn: 她把房子漆成令人恶心的黄色.

sentences.en: The adder is Britain's only venomous snake.
sentences.cn: 蝰蛇是英国唯一的一种毒蛇。

sentences.en: The boy got entangled by a venomous snake.
They shot each other venomous glances.
sentences.cn: 他们恶狠狠地朝对方瞪眼.

sentences.en: We kept a vigilant eye out for alligators and for venomous snakes.
sentences.cn: 我们警惕地睁大眼睛,以防短吻鳄和毒蛇的出现.

words.tran_cn: 充满恶意地；狠毒地，恶毒地
有毒的；恶毒的；[动]分泌毒液的；怨恨的

trans.tran_cn: （蛇等）分泌毒液的，有毒的，<书>恶毒的，恶意的
